info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:18PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Bladen, northwestern Columbus and north central Horry Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cherry Grove, or 15 miles southwest of Whiteville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Tabor City, Chadbourn, Lake Waccamaw, Hallsboro, Cherry Grove, Redbug, Sidney, Southeastern Community College, Clarendon, Williams, Brunswick, Clarkton, Cerro Gordo and Columbus Regional Healthcare System. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
